official_title: A bill to amend chapter 113 of title 18 of the United States Code to strengthen the laws against computer program and data base piracy and counterfeiting, and for other purposes.
short_title: Computer Software Piracy and Counterfeiting Amendments of 1982

summary.text: Computer Software Piracy and Counterfeiting Amendments of 1982 - Amends the Federal criminal code to increase penalties for the criminal infringement of the copyright of computer software.

titles.title: Computer Software Piracy and Counterfeiting Amendments of 1982
A bill to amend chapter 113 of title 18 of the United States Code to strengthen the laws against computer program and data base piracy and counterfeiting, and for other purposes.
